summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6257 for the improvement of the alley in 30th Ave. Addition, being the alley between 29th Ave. and 30th Ave. From East Alder Street to approximately 310 feet north thereof; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90625, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
